TextView.android:text:
README
Project 6 - Yixuan Feng
This project let user enter flight number, three letter source code, departure time, three letter destination code and arrive time to add new airline/existing airline.
User could also choose to print/pretty print airline information.
User could search flight with airline name, three letter source code and three letter dest code.

Note:
There is exampled input data, please follow the same format to input :)
